Comments_List: This class is very helpful in reinforcing topics from the lecture class. You do a lot of rock identifying and then get into larger structures later in the semester.

Strengths: Class helps reinforce topics from lecture class. Has a very reasonable amount of work for a 1/2 credit lab course. Very worth the science credit! Professor is very nice! Weaknesses: Gets very repetitive and slightly boring after a few weeks.
Yes! Interesting topics, minimal work, pretty easy!
